TopicTitle: I'm at a loss and in need of help.

Articles.Content:
Forgive me if I'm doing this wrong, I haven't posted to a forum in quite some time. I'm not sure if I can be helped, but my problem is with the B9 aerospace mod. In particular the M27 cockpit. All other parts work perfectly, but when I use this part several things go wrong:

I cannot see my staging,

I cannot see my crew members,

The general "shift to activate next stage" doesn't work,

And must strangely, when I manually activate a thruster, I have to pause and then unique before the game responds and allows me to throttle up.

I'm not very savvy with the config side if things, but I desperately want to get this working. Sorry again if this question is dumb or out of place and thank you for your time.
